name: ROBLOX Black Rock Shooter Background
description:
A modification that changes the HUD to be black and blue, and adds a picture of Black ★ Rock Shooter.

If you want to request something, you have a few ways to reach me.

1) Message me on Discord (Takeka  //『白の女王, 狂々帝』#8857), send me a friend request, image you want, and color of the menus.
(this is the quickest way for your request)
